Review.Contenu: Totally not worth the price.Edit: I still think it's not worth the price and think something like this could be charged at half the rate its currently being charged at. Go to a bike shop and sit on a bike. You won't be long finding a size that suits. It seems to me that you can not accept this as an opinion and instead you think it must be a misunderstanding. I went directly to trust pilot as they asked me to leave a review. You didn't. I think it's too expensive for what you get in return. Or am I misunderstanding?

Review.Titre: Not suitable if having short legs and long torso
Review.Contenu: The results I got seemed very off, I double-checked and triple-checked the measurements, but the results were out of every imaginable scope. I have short legs and a long torso, resulting in very large bike sizes. E.g. Canyon recommends a size small, but Best Bike Advice recommends a size large with a very very long reach. I don't have confidence in buying the bike based on this fit.Taking measurements seems to be relatively simple, though help from someone is very beneficial.

Failed to provide any sizes, even if the standard measurements were entered, and not my actual measurements so its not a miss-measure on my behalf. So took the money but did not provide an answer, frustrating.

Review.Titre: Ok but has flaws which made it useless.
Review.Contenu: I suppose as an automated program it's OK but for me there wasn't a single bike in the list that had the geometry suited to me. I found this strange as my current bike (Cannondale Synapse) was in their list and it fits me.

Review.Titre: I spent 20 minutes to answer all these…
Review.Contenu: I spent 20 minutes to answer all these questions. At the end they asked money. They should have said so from the beginning

Review.Titre: Results of bike fit is rubbish
Good concept but I’m not sure I…
Review.Contenu: Good concept but I’m not sure I received enough information to make a decision on frame size.

After purchasing, the company said i had 24 hours to make adjustments. When i went to make adjustments within the permitted time it wouldn’t allow me. When i emailed to say about the problem “Jaap” said id have to purchase it again. They were very unhelpful and felt ripped off

Review.Titre: My measures are different and the…
Review.Contenu: My measures are different and the difference is about 6 cm in height and a little less in the other measures. Also the boy didn’t sound competent.

I bought the bike fit advice for my partner and I. For us the fit measurements was not very good, in fact my partner put her bike back to how it was before the adjustments. We both found some of the measurements to adjust our bikes to confusing - the centre of bottom bracket to top of seat being one of them as it doesn't take into account the types of pedals or shoes used, so the measurements can be a long was off what is perfect. I wouldn't bother using this again, I'd pay more more and have a face to face setup.
Euro centric, less applicable to North America. Had recent software glitch, did not provide correct modelling. Diagrams of critical distances is vague.
It's probably very good, but it is not clear at the outset that this is a paid service. That's annoying.
If i follow the bikefit measurments then i get lot of problems. Pain in my wrist, lot of pain in my sholders. For me this bikefitting didn't work
Now, if you ask it yourself, 12,50 (not 12, like I was told) euro is a little much for just some quicky made software...

Review.Titre: Good for sizing, not good for bike recommendations
Review.Contenu: While the fit and sizing advice is quite OK, the recommendations for specific bicycle models are lacking and have significant room for improvement.

Review.Titre: This tool gives conventional bike fit…
Review.Contenu: This tool gives conventional bike fit measures. I guess the measures are OK if you are looking for this. This is tipically the case for road bikes.However, more recent MTBs tend to departure from these conventional fit measures as they have more relaxed geometries, encouraging riders to adopt a more upright posture. If you have an MTB with this type of geometry, then you may have troubles to incorporate the recommendations of this tool.
Not worth the money, set the bike up without this making it feel comfortable then checked the dimensions given by this service and there was very little difference.
Was it worth £20, ,possibly not. From my measurements the algorithms said I need a large frame - which I know I don't! I know the site will say, you have inputted incorrect data, but I haven't

Sorry, didn't work for me, I was fitted well to my bike previously and tried this being curious, feel really bunched up with this position I've been given, painful in shoulders,neck,elbows, also you need more than 24 hours to make minor adjustments if you've a measurement error or want to change something based on one ride, 7 days would be better, not worth a one or two star as I found the process very good, although the question of what roads you are riding on either flat or hilly needs an option of both.

Review.Titre: The cheapest level does not provide…
Review.Contenu: The cheapest level does not provide bike suggestions, and the app seems to be suited for the pre areo SL bike era.
the fitting was good, but the advice for bikes is only one day ....

Review.Titre: The delay off 24 hrs to make…
Review.Contenu: The delay off 24 hrs to make adjustments is ro short. Should be 48 hrs.

Review.Titre: Easy and lots of learning and…
Review.Contenu: Easy and lots of learning and information.Including how to and how much to purchase a bike for.Unfortunate we cannot target or get hold of bikes that easily in my region of E Africa.

Review.Titre: Great for choosing and setting up a bike!
Review.Contenu: The bike fit and bike finder are great tools! Using them together has really helped me understand what I want from a bike and narrow down the options.

Review.Titre: Comprehensive yet affordable bike fit measurements
Review.Contenu: The bike fit measurements give me a very comprehensive way in adjusting my bike and it quite accurate. However the saddle height seems a bit to high for me, not sure if my error in measurements even though I took average from my couple of measurements. Yet they provided some other ways to gauge the correct seat height which is helpful. Now my bike is all good!

Review.Titre: This service work pretty well. But...
Review.Contenu: This service work pretty well. I was able to find some positions that worked much better for me. I'd say it's definitely worth it if you are having trouble getting your geometry right and there is not bike shop in your area that does fittings. I do wish that they had a feature that allows you to enter the stem length and then they recommed the bar drop.

Review.Titre: Clear site and guidance on measurements
Review.Contenu: Not sure how this compares to an actual bikefitter yet. Yes you can have mismeasurements but I think the overall range advise offered of reach and stack is quite large.(with my frame options, it did had all vendors offering s/m/l/xl )so it did not help me with selecting a frame. Site is clear and easy to use, Proactive team, offer personal follow-up.

Since it is nothing but an automated system....there´s not much to say about how it works.Being an automated system, based on algorithms with a lot of research behind them, it is a very good starting point.Since the human body has so many variables, this is a very good starting point to then little by little get the perfect fit, making small changes, one at a time.

Good guidance and advise for new beginner on cycling sport. So can know what we needed exactly. Personally I would recommend this to all my friend. But some of them said to expensive, but that was relative I thinks...Another thing are service after sales are great, keep contacting and giving advise after was one of the touching partThank for you

I discovered that with my measures I need to  replace certain parts on the bike, I know which frame size per brand and the exact cms that it needs to be configured. It was fast and worth the money to do the online bike fitting and the report I can keep forever. I was more sure about the online acquisition of the race bike as well.

Review.Titre: measuring your body gives insight about…
Review.Contenu: measuring your body gives insight about how to adjust your bike in the best way.I trust on my own experience when configuring my bike. But the fitting helps to finetune settings on the bike and works as a good second opion.

Review.Titre: I have followed your recommendation and…
Review.Contenu: I have followed your recommendation and try to understand more about road bike and feel like I’m improving now. Anyways can you also produce the video clips in explaining each key concepts of bike fit

Review.Titre: for my dimensions there was no suitable…
Review.Contenu: for my dimensions there was no suitable bike to be found, also i didnot get advice as to what comes close.So I had no advice, but I had to payNa persoonlijk contact prima opgelost
I ve changed my opinion for this institution, people communicate very promptly and they want to help with bike fit.if I wasn't enjoy with the result, they refunded money back.

Review.Titre: Useful tool to select a bike that fits your body
Review.Contenu: Clear guidelines how to measure your body dimensions resulting in a useful advice which bikes fits you best
Good system for bikefitting

Easy to follow procedure, from measuring yourself and setting up your bike.I've had 2 bike fits at bike shops and this is all over them.Finally feels like my bike fits perfectly.Able to generate more consistent power feeling comfortable at the same time.

This was truly helpful. I don’t live near a bike fit specialist, so this was a great option. I received a prompt response to my question via email. I especially appreciate the ability to update my measurements for 24 hours to get it fully dialed in.

Review.Titre: 'Best bike advice' gave me a set-up and…
Review.Contenu: 'Best bike advice' gave me a set-up and I fitted the bike accordingly. It felt good, but I went to the pro bike fitter too, as I already had an appointment. Almost no changes, exact setup.

The "fit" that I was offered was extremely close to the "fit" I have been successfully riding.  Within the margins of measuring error of the human!The ability to then play "what if" with some of the measurements (principally the seat post height) was interesting and matched some of the guidance and notes offered with the fit.Ultimately - when I used the "suggest a bike" feature and was offered the exact bike I had purchased 4 months before - I had to laugh.Great minds think alike (or we are both fools!)

Review.Titre: Great value for basic bike fitting
Review.Contenu: Everyone with a road bike is usually pretty much capable of doing the basic measuring (and has the tooling). This site provides the important calculations that you need to do the basic fitting yourself. Especially useful if you buy a second-hand bike!My personal experience is that I was able to check on 4 important points and did some changes, with as a result, wayyy less hurting from long rides.

Review.Titre: Quick, Easy, Accurate Setup from Home
Review.Contenu: Excellent online resource to get your bike setup measurements quickly, from home and in my case, pretty damned accurately for my style / frequency of riding.  Highly recommend.  The report is very extensive, with more options available beyond the initial setup measurements.

Lots of clear guidance on taking measurements. I was grateful for the opportunity to modify my measurements. I could have done with an obvious way to modify my riding style from a moderately aggressive to casual. I was worried I would have to pay again. I didn't thankfully.The results looked very useful. I will be taking them with me when I collect the new bike. We'll see how accurate it turns out to be.

I just used this on my first road bike, as I was getting a bit of neck pain after 25 miles or so.It was easy to use and reasonably priced.It shows the "average" length of each body part for someone of your height. I knew I had longer arms and legs and short torso so when checking I was 2-3cm longer/shorter in these places it was peace of mind my measurements were near correct.Took about 1.5-2 hours measuring and fitting the bike, I went out and instantly felt my upper body was more comfortable.Saddle height could've been a smidge too high, but this could be down to my mis measure or strange body shape. Overall very satisfying experience for an amateur, and much cheaper than a £100+ bike fit.

Im really impressed by personal attitude Ive received by the Best Bike Advice! Long story short, I was measured my leg length wrong which made an impression on Best Bike Advice staff. They pointed this on me and give me a new bike fit report with estimated value of my wrong measurement. We've exchanged couple of emails. Very good communication with the support.Im really happy overall. Recommend!

Highly recommend this service! If you feel that something is not correct - just contact the support via customer support form and they will definitely help! Also, pay high attention to how you are measuring yourself. For beginners like me who are between sizes - this website defiantly does the trick and saves from not spending 200eur.

I started participating in the 100-150 km amateur gravel races which made me think I should invest in a bike fitting. Since the professional bike fit costs around 300€ in my country and I am not a professional rider, I decided to try the "Best Bike Advice". I paid 12,49€ and I was impressed! It took me a while to do all body measurements but when I receive a report and set my bike according to the results, it significantly improved comfort and efficiency. And for a single payment, I was able to repeat the report for my Enduro bike.I think this is a great service for amateur riders who don't need professional bike fitting.A big Kudos to the team behind the Best Bike Advice!

I was given clear information about the fit of my bicycle to me and how to get the best from my existing ride, and info for future purchases. I have been able to apply this info straight away and feel the instant benefits of it. All the different terms used are explained so that I was not left guessing about what anything meant.

This is a very accurate and easy way of getting your fit right, it also gives you helpful recommendations about the fit and what to look for.It helped me get rid of a nagging knee problem I'd had for ages and I feel more comfortable on the bike.

Review.Titre: Too little parameters in the output, but for your own sake it is enough!
Review.Contenu: This is an updated review.All the input measurements are well explained and are relatively easy to take. That's just the reason it is, at fist glance, somewhat puzzling that when you pay you just get four parameters. Nevertheless I was assisted by an expert from Best Bike Advice to get more light on the reason of this. When you read and learn that human factor matters more than the geometry stuff of all manufacturers, then you get the point on why with just those four parameters are enough information to fit your bike. I was surprised by the good explanation and the good attention this guys gave me, so I changed my review.
The experience was very positive, easy to follow and well explained. The system was even able to workout some of the measurements required which were confirmed by the manual measurements. Excellent!

Review.Titre: I'm new to drop bar bikes and I was…
Review.Contenu: I'm new to drop bar bikes and I was lost trying to get my Cervelo Aspero dialed in to my body geometry. I'm also right in between a 54 and a 56 from what I can tell. I decided to go with the 56. Jaap and Best Bike Advice have been a huge help. I've put 196 miles on my bike with 93 miles based on the fit I received from Best Bike Advice. 40 of those miles were on XC single track in the saddle for 4 hours. I have to say that I am very comfortable and I feel like I can get a lot of power out of each turn of the cranks. I'm sure I may have to make some minor changes as I get more time in the saddle, but this is a great way to start. Being a licensed land surveyor I even brought photos of myself on the bike into AutoCADD to analyze my geometry. The fit I received is right in the sweet spot for saddle height, saddle offset, and reach from the saddle. The   bike fitting holds up for in the saddle comfort, as well as pure body geometry.This service is well worth the money in my opinion.

What a brilliant service!!!Yes, you have to do your own measurements and yes you have to then make your own bike adjustments. Will it be a prefect as paying £100+ for a professional to do it.... No. But here is the clincher for the 80% of us that do not compete and require a prefect setup. This will get you within 90% of a prefect setup at a tenth of a professional setup. Best Bike advice double check your measurements to ensure a great service. Can highly recommend!!

I waited a few weeks because I wanted to do a few rides first before writing a review. I was struggling with lower backpain after 40-50 km on my race bike so decided (before spending 200€ on a specialist) to do the online bikefitting. Need to adjust height of saddle slightly but also had to move saddle 4 cm to the front. Next to that I changed the steering pen to a longer one. Conclusions after 5 rides: bank pain has stopped! So I am very happy with the outcome

Happy with my bikefit! I didn't know where to start when I wanted to buy a bike, but this tool helped me. It was very interesting to see what questions/measurements I had to fill in. It looked very professional and I could read/understand the differences between all the bikes. And for a good price. My friend is also convinced, he is going to try it too. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The best place for a good on-line bike fit advice
Review.Contenu: The best place for a good on-line bike fit advice with clear measuring instructions. The advice is exttensive and comes with lots of useful tips for both the novice and more experienced biker. Highly recommended!
I got a clear advice, with good explanations, you can do multiple calculations. Didn't put the results to the test though, must buy some stuff first.They live up to my expectations.

Review.Titre: Good service and someone to contact in case you have any questions
Review.Contenu: The website is user friendly, after uploading all the measurements you receive the ideal cycling position for you.I have tried it and initially needed some more help, Jaap was in touch with me and cleared any doubts or questions.I can recommend this service to others.

If you’re thinking about a more scientific approach to bike fit then I would wholeheartedly recommend this website. Be careful and methodical on measuring  and you’ll one out with a good bike fit for not much money. I went for the £25 option and had a query about my saddle height, I emailed the company and got a very prompt and in depth response from Jaap. I can’t pick any fault at all he took the time to explain where I may have made a mistake and explained a way of getting round the issue. My advice would be try it you’ll be pleased.

Review.Titre: After doing several bike fits I was…
Review.Contenu: After doing several bike fits I was pretty skeptical at first, also there may have been some errors in my measurements, but the set up that I got worked really well, moreover after replacing the seat I am very comfortable riding an aggressive full aero position for extended amount of time. Definitely worth a shot.

I have struggled to get optimal bike fit information in regards to my road and mountain bike especially since we do not have actual bike fitters in the city where i live. I got some really good info on the parameters for both my road and mountain bike from Best Bike Advice
Great bike fit service, especially for the price. Was able to make a few small adjustments on my road bike, without having to guess at what to do, that made a significant improvement in my comfort.

Immediately I noticed the difference between my old bike position (which gave me some hamstring pain after long rides) and the new position! I already spread the word and advised some friends and colleagues to do the same!

Review.Titre: Easy way to get an extensive bikefit advice
Review.Contenu: Very handy way to get extensive bikefit advice with clearly explained measurement instructions. The bike advice clearly indicates which bikes fit your needs and how to set them up

After months of pain in my left leg, ankle, and numbness in the groin I opted to find some information around getting a proper bike fit. Best Bike Advice came up in my searches and I was pleasantly surprised how easy an online bike fit actually is. My measurements were taken and BBA gave me rundown of what settings I need for an optimal fit, after doing this I can confirm without a doubt this setup on my training bike is now fantastic and it feels perfect! Thank you to BBA for offering this service, you have really come to my rescue :) I will definitely be purchasing a higher package to ensure my other Road Bike and Mountain bike can also be setup to fit my body.
Bike fit measurements provided were truly helpful. It made me enjoy ride in more relaxed manner and helped to take longer rides with confidence
Got bike fit in a mix, changing for racing and indoor use. Had got uncomfortable. This gave me good guidance to get back to a great neutral position.
Simple & easy instructions for setting up the bike & really pleased with the results, comfort has improved massively 👌🏻

Review.Titre: Received some help form the team as I…
Review.Contenu: Received some help form the team as I had misinterpreted some of the info.  They were helpful. Thank you
Instructions on how to pleasure are clean (a second pair of hands are helpfull) output is good and helpdesk good in speed and content.

Review.Titre: Intelligent approach, meticulous care, fantastic support
Review.Contenu: BBA takes all your important body MEASUREMENTS, plus riding style, fitness etc. (as inputs) to calculate FOUR key NUMBERS (outputs). These are intelligently designed, because:1. they tell you exactly how to SET UP the bike for optimal fit, and2. he deduces (tells you) the corresponding reach and stack (ranges) to help you CHOOSE a bike that will be a good fit.Like any modelling tool, rubbish in = rubbish out, so he explains exactly how to take all the measurements ACCURATELY, and tells how far they deviate from the AVERAGE for your height - with further advice (at the end) to ensure they are spot on.All the supporting DOCUMENTS are very well explained, in words and diagrams, and cover everything you need to know to adjust the bike correctly.He provides supporting TOOLS and information to choose the ideal stem, spacers, handlebars, etc. for your bike frame and fit.SUPPORT: I have untypical body measurements, making it harder to evaluate a new bike, so I emailed Jaap. He got back to me promptly with a most helpful and thorough reply.WORTH the money? IMO definitely yes: I had started by looking for a bike fit calculator that was free, but everywhere I looked I found only very basic tools which were of little use.By comparison, the extensive knowledge, thought and care that Jaap has put into BBA are evident throughout, and give me a high degree of confidence in the process and the numbers.I paid for the six months option (£17.50), which I'm very happy with: It's a wonderfully useful service, and well worth every penny - esp. compared to the cost of a new bike, a face-to-face consultation, and/or fixing pain/discomfort when riding.
Perfectly explained how to measure yourself. Nice and clear explanation how to use the bike fitting data. Result: perfect positioning and no pain anymore!
Adequate bikefit! Turned out my bike was already quite a good fit for me, but nice to have the confrimation my bike position was good!
Followed the instructions / measurements, witch took me to with in a couple of millimetres of spot on/ the sweet spot. If you have lost your way, this will help find it again. It works.

Review.Titre: Best bike advice improved my cycling…
Review.Contenu: Best bike advice improved my cycling position on bike. Very useful site. Thanks!
Great and affordable bike fit calculator. Gives you a good idea what bike (road bike in my case) to purchase.

Review.Titre: I had a very helpful one-time bike fit
Review.Contenu: I had a very helpful one-time bike fit, using several body and bike measurements!
Awesome setup app. Includes valuable tips and explanations all the way to cleat fit.
It was very helpful and I also like the fact that they made it perfectly clear that all info is purely informative.
Clear and very useable advice. I really understand better how to tweak the variables of my MTB now. My ride is more comfortable.
After giving all the measurements,  i received an email with all the measurements for my bike. Really helpful!
The advices fitted perfect for me. For the first set-up it's the best price for value mainly for beginners.

Review.Titre: Having made an expensive mistake buying…
Review.Contenu: Having made an expensive mistake buying a bad fitting bike, I found this exceptionally useful (and very good value) in finding a new one.
Quick and simple to follow guidelines to measure yourself. I was already close with my own bikefit 'on feel', but I want to see where I could improve. I was able to bike pain free the next ride!
great advice and reliable service. only site to be able to source an alternative to my needs.
Easy to measure yourself. Nice to play with the agressive position and to set up road and mtb.
I am very satisfied with the advice from Best Bike Advice, thank you
Value for money. Clear instructions and explanations. Very happy with my choice!

Review.Titre: Very impressed with accuracy and ease…
Review.Contenu: Very impressed with accuracy and ease of doing
Excellent advice, made some small changes to  the bike. Have to find out if this will help with some small issues I had.
Very helpfull bike fitting program,I tried it and I'm very happy with my new setup.
A simple objective system. Worked well and could be of use to others.

Great bike fit, very fast and very professional. Highly recommend

Quick & easy. Clear results, love it!
